column1: Management and Optimization of Supply chains and Transport (MOST)
column5: The program aims to give a competitive edge to students and young professionals interested in industrial engineering and engineering management with a high emphasis on quantitative methods for decision making in the field of supply chain and transport management and optimization.Check out the MSc leaflet !ContentThe program includes 3 academic semesters on IMT Atlantique Nantes campus + 6-month paid internship in a company or lab.Year 1:>Supply chain engineering & management
column7: Non-European students : 12,000 euros/ year - European students : 6,000 euros/ year
